meanings.definition: Joined or fused together, especially bones in a joint.
meanings.sent1: The ankylosed bones in his wrist made movement difficult.
meanings.sent2: The ankylosed joints in her fingers were a result of the injury.
meanings.sent3: The ankylosed bones in the puzzle were impossible to separate.
meanings.sent4: The ankylosed branches of the trees intertwined like old friends.
meanings.sent5: The ankylosed door refused to budge, sealing the room shut.

meanings.definition: To become rigid or immobile due to fusion of bones or joints.
meanings.sent1: Over time, the injury caused his fingers to ankylose.
meanings.sent2: The lack of movement caused the joint to ankylose.
meanings.sent3: The rusty old robot ankylosed after years of neglect.
meanings.sent4: His heart seemed to ankylose with fear at the sight.
meanings.sent5: The gears in the machine ankylosed, halting its operation.
